posts.post_title: FS: T206 Tinker Portrait P150 SGC 60 - $750 dlvd ON HOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling below my cost a few years ago on Hunt Auction.  PayPal friends/family preferred.  I paid $894.55 with shipping and buyer's premium (link below).  My loss is your gain!  :D

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested!

Thanks for looking!


[url]https://huntauctions.com/phone/imageviewer.cfm?auction_num=143&lot_num=15[/url]

I'll take it if still available.

Thank you
Tim
Thanks for all of the interest. Sale is on hold for the moment.
